purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 证)
Pictophonetic: 登 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
證明 [ zhèng míng ]: proof; certificate; identification; testimonial; Classifiers: 个 ; to prove; to testify; to confirm the truth of
證據 [ zhèng jù ]: evidence; proof; testimony
證實 [ zhèng shí ]: to confirm (sth to be true); to verify
證券 [ zhèng quàn ]: negotiable security (financial); certificate; stocks and bonds

Ru_trainchinese:
zhèng: (сущ) сертификат, свидетельство
zhèng: (сущ/глаг) свидетельство, доказательство; доказывать, демонстрировать
zhèng: (сущ) (ТКМ) симптом / синдром
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Correct words can serve as evidence in court.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " speaking " and " boarding ", the original meaning is to inform and report. "Shuowen": "Reporting. From the words to the sound." "The Analects of Confucius. Zilu": "Ye Gongyu Confucius said: "Our party has straight bowers, and his father threw the sheep, and the son proves it.""

" Certificate " can mean verification and verification. "Songs of the Chu ‧ Nine Chapters ‧ Xi Chan": "So the minister is not like a king, so the proof is not far away." Wang Yi's note: "Proof, verify."

" Certificate " also means proof and evidence. "The Book of Great Dais & Rites-Officials of the King of Wen": "Put your own heart with peace of mind and use the six certificates with caution." Lu Bian's note: "Six certificates, six levies."

" Certificate " also indicates that it is the criterion. Han Yangxiong's "Taixuan‧ Cong": "Secondly, people don't attack it, and follow it by themselves. The test says: People don't attack it, and naturally prove it." Fan Wang's note: "Proof, then also." correct. Annotated by Sima Guang: "A gentleman is willing to be good, and he doesn't need to attack him. The proof is right."

" Certificate " also means admonishment. "Warring States Policy‧Qi Ceyi": "Senior lieutenant gave proof of Jingguo, who refused to listen, Shiwei resigned."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " speaking " and " boarding ", the original meaning is to inform and report.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「登」聲，本義為告發、檢舉。《說文》：「告也。从言，登聲。」《論語‧子路》：「葉公語孔子曰：『吾黨有直躬者，其父攘羊，而子證之。』」

　　「證」可表示驗證、證實。《楚辭‧九章‧惜誦》：「故相臣莫若君兮，所以證之不遠。」王逸注：「證，驗也。」

　　「證」也表示憑證、證據。《大戴禮記‧文王官人》：「平心去私，慎用六證。」盧辯注：「六證，六徵也。」

　　「證」還表示以之為准則。漢揚雄《太玄‧從》：「次三，人不攻之，自牽從之。測曰：人不攻之，自然證也。」范望注：「證，則也。」一說行為端正。司馬光集注：「君子率性自從於善，不待攻治也。證當作正。」

　　「證」亦表示諫正。《戰國策‧齊策一》：「士尉以證靖郭君，靖郭君不聽，士尉辭而去。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「登」聲，本義為告發、檢舉。

    • 登 [ dēng ] to rise, to mount, to board, to climb

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 登 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 登 [ dēng ] to rise, to mount, to board, to climb
①用人物、事實來表明或斷定：證明。保證。證實。作證。對證。論證。人證。物證。
②憑據，幫助斷定事理的東西：證據。憑證。證書。出入證。證章。有詩爲證。證券。

從「 言 」，「 登 」聲，本義為告發、檢舉。《說文》：「告也。从言，登聲。」《論語‧子路》：「葉公語孔子曰：『吾黨有直躬者，其父攘羊，而子證之。』」 「 證 」可表示驗證、證實。《楚辭‧九章‧惜誦》：「故相臣莫若君兮，所以證之不遠。」王逸注：「證，驗也。」 「 證 」也表示憑證、證據。《大戴禮記‧文王官人》：「平心去私，慎用六證。」盧辯注：「六證，六徵也。」 「 證 」還表示以之為准則。漢揚雄《太玄‧從》：「次三，人不攻之，自牽從之。測曰：人不攻之，自然證也。」范望注：「證，則也。」一說行為端正。司馬光集注：「君子率性自從於善，不待攻治也。證當作正。」 「 證 」亦表示諫正。《戰國策‧齊策一》：「士尉以證靖郭君，靖郭君不聽，士尉辭而去。」

Zilu": "Ye Gongyu Confucius said: "Our party has straight bowers, and his father threw the sheep, and the son proves it."" " Certificate" can mean verification and verification. "Songs of the Chu ‧ Nine Chapters ‧ Xi Chan": "So the minister is not like a king, so the proof is not far away." Wang Yi's note: "Proof, verify." " Certificate" also means proof and evidence. "The Book of Great Dais & Rites-Officials of the King of Wen": "Put your own heart with peace of mind and use the six certificates with caution." Lu Bian's note: "Six certificates, six levies." " Certificate" also indicates that it is the criterion. Han Yangxiong's "Taixuan‧ Cong": "Secondly, people don't attack it, and follow it by themselves. The test says: People don't attack it, and naturally prove it." Fan Wang's note: "Proof, then also." correct. Annotated by Sima Guang: "A gentleman is willing to be good, and he doesn't need to attack him. The proof is right." " Certificate" also means admonishment. 證字的基本解释

證
zhèng
见“证”。
同“症1”。

證字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèng］
［《廣韻》諸應切，去證，章。］
“证1”的繁体字。
(1)告发，检举。
(2)验证；证实。
(3)凭证；证据。
(4)以之为准则。汉扬雄《太玄·从》：“次三，人不攻之，自牽從之。測曰：人不攻之，自然證也。”范望注：“證，則也。”一说行为端正。司马光集注：“君子率性自從於善，不待攻治也。證當作正。”
(5)谏正。
(6)佛教语。参悟，修行得道。
(7)病况，症候。后多作“症”。

證字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　證； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1180第14
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?諸應切，蒸去聲。【說文】告也。【玉篇】驗也。【增韻】?也，質也。【論語】其父攘羊而子證之。【史記·齊悼惠王世家】令其辭證皆引王。【後漢·張衡傳】采前世成事，以爲證驗。【宋書·沈約自序】探摘是非，各標證據。　又與徵通。【禮·中庸】雖善無徵，無徵不信。【註】善無明徵，則其善不信也。徵或爲證。　【集韻】唐武后作?。

證字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
證字的起名意思

暂无。

certificate
zhèng
witness".
Same as "Symptom 1".
certificate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhèng］
["Guangyun" all Yingqie, go to prove, chapter. ]
Traditional characters of "证1".
(1) Report and report.
(2) Verification; confirmation.
(3) Credentials; evidence.
(4) Take it as the criterion. Han Yangxiong's "Tai Xuan Cong": "The third time, people don't attack it, but they will follow it. Test said: People don't attack it, naturally prove it." Fan Wang's note: "Provide it, then it." Behave well. Sima Guang's notes: "A gentleman is willing to be good, and he does not need to attack and cure. The proof is right."
(5) Admonishment.
(6) Buddhist language. Enlightenment, practice well.
(7) Conditions and symptoms. Later, it is often referred to as "symptom".
